attributes.action: Stop the closure of Taylor High School in New Stevenston
attributes.additional_details: North Lanarkshire revealed plans to close down both Taylor High School and Our Lady's High School and merge both schools onto one brand new campus. There's no need for this, as Taylor High is only 32 years old and, despite being a horrid looking school on the outside, it's amazing on the inside. A 4 year old state of the art recording studio will be demolished if this school is closed down!
